sources.title: Tales of Robin Hood (1951) COLORIZED | Adventure Full Length Movie
sources.description:
The story of the outlaw, Robin Hood, how he met his Merry Men in Sherwood Forest to do battle with the brutal Sheriff of Nottingham and his oppressive tax collectors, who are stripping the poor villagers of what little they have left.  Oh and Maid Marian is to be saved too.  Compiled from the few filmed episodes of an unsold TV series.

Director: James Tinling
Writer: Leroy H. Zehren
Stars: Robert Clarke, Mary Hatcher, Paul Cavanagh

Watch the original Black & White version: https://youtu.be/VQvN-GK1I0A

CCC CHAPTERS: in the general comments tell us your favorite scene and we will add it  
00:00 Full Length Movie
06:42 Already forgot
15:15 Sword play

33:04 Sword fight
43:06 Ye old pub  
54:29 Ass thief is dished some medieval justice

sources.title: Tales of Robin Hood (1951) Robert Clarke, Mary Hatcher | Adventure | Full Movie, subtitles
sources.description:
The story of Robin Hood, how he met his Merry Men and Maid Marian, and saved England from Sir Guy de Clairmont and his henchman. Compiled from the few filmed episodes of an unsold TV series.  

Original title: Tales of Robin Hood (1951) 

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/dfTqRW1SJJk

Director: James Tinling
Writer: Leroy H. Zehren
Stars: Robert Clarke, Mary Hatcher, Paul Cavanagh

Summary:
Defiance, Resistance, and the Fight for Freedom in 12th Century England as Robin Hood Becomes a Symbol of Hope and Leader of Outlaws, Recruiting New Members and Offering Help and Hospitality Along the Way, Planning to Uncover the Truth Behind His Father's Death, Facing Captivity, Tension, and a Desperate Rescue Mission to Save Maid Marian, Culminating in a Surprising Peace Agreement and Wedding.

00:00 Full Movie

29:37 üèπ Sir Guy plans to capture Robin Hood and Marian, causing confusion and tension.
40:46 üè∞ The men of Sir Guy capture three of Robin Hood's men and plan to hang them, while Marianne is hidden in a cave.

metadata.Plot: An outlaw and his band sally forth from their hideout in Sherwood Forest to do battle with the brutal Sheriff of Nottingham and his oppressive tax collectors, who are stripping the poor villagers of what little they have left.
metadata.Actors: Robert Clarke, Mary Hatcher, Paul Cavanagh
